Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Jadom alaha di madada a ga'i ate jita (ho ga'i)
Ate tusim dekhoge ki loka jathi'am de jathe alaha de dina vica samila ho rahe hana
Tam apane raba di sifata salaha karo, usa di prasasa de nala ate usa tom mu'afi mago. Besaka uha mu'afa karana vala hai
